overview:
Jonathan Lacoste is a student leader at Boston College and a passionate tech entrepreneur. Jonathan is studying in the Carroll School of Management and is expected to graduate in May, 2015.

Jonathan is currently the COO for Jebbit, a technology startup looking to connect college students with innovative and exciting companies, websites, and mobile apps. His main responsibilities include managing the day-to-day operations of the team and helping to develop the future vision and strategy of the company.

In addition, Jonathan serves as the Coca-Cola Representative for the Boston College community, serving as a liaison between Coca-Cola, the administration, and the student body.

As a passionate member of the Boston startup community, Jonathan is also a student ambassador at Boston College for the BostonStartupSchool, a competitive program designed to groom recent college graduates into the perfect member of a local startup.

In his spare time, Jonathan is also a fervent runner, having run in several marathons including the 2012 Boston Marathon.
